Articles.Content:
Hi i have started to write out some cfg files and downloaded blender to model and do texturing but its all to overwelming for me. Could someone walk me though modeling and texturing and is there another that i can use for this?

Thanks

Everything you need should be here.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/3730-The-COMPLETE-KSP-Blender-Tutorial%21-Video-Back%21
